content: {"name": "Food Rescue Baltimore @ Old Major/Historic Pigtown", "alternate_name": "", "description": "FRESH PRODUCE: Provides free produce and other food to those in need. The food is often rescued from markets, restaurants, or other organizations, to decrease waste and to help communities experiencing food insecurity. Distribution occurs at various locations throughout the city.For an updated and comprehensive list of participating sites and their giveaway times, visit the website: https://www.foodrescuebaltimore.org\nPeople are encouraged to bring their own bags and select what items they want.For last minute notifications including supplies or weather-related cancellations, visit https://www.facebook.com/foodrescueday/", "email": "", "url": "https://www.foodrescuebaltimore.org/?i=1#locations", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "900 South Carey Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Pigtown", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21223", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.2819319, "longitude": -76.6373715}, "phones": [{"number": "(443) 873-7363", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}]}
